name: JIM BEATS ORANGE
LEONARDO HIDALGO
description: Leonardo Hidalgo is one of the busiest Miami based leading neo-pop artists whose work has attracted international acclaim and is collected worldwide for his fine art paintings, and memorable portraits of famous faces. Ecuadorian by birth, Hidalgo, has made the United States his home since 1990 and breathes and lives painting as a career ever since. www.leonardohidalgo.com Contact:info@leonardohidalgo.com Tel. 786-217-0130

description: Custom made art pillow cover inspired from HIdalgo's original art work titled "NEW YORK NEW YORK". The pillow is made from 100% remie fabric, a stylish statement that will liven up any room. The pillow cover measures 26" x 26", features a screenprint and is finished with tie ends for ease of care. Includes pillow insert. Made in the USA Another size available 16" x 20"

description:
Limited edition screen print on fine deckled edge museum paper, hand retouched by the artist. 

Each screenprint is unique with different colors with Hidalgo's signature splash of glitter. 

Measures 22' x 28"

For more information please email us at info@leonardohidalgo.com or call 786-217-0130.
